text: Agek bin anɨb ak agak, Bɨawl, nɨŋɨd apan ak pen, chen ñɨluk okok nap kɨli apɨlɨg tap ñɨŋɨlaknɨŋ, dayday bog muk okok yowup okok nep ñɨbal agak.15.27 Jisas ne takaw paladaŋ lɨl agɨl, Juda binɨb kɨli ñapay tek mɨdebal, binɨb Juda mel kɨli chen tek mɨdebal agak. Anɨb ak bin ak ne Jisas takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, Jisas nop agak, Bɨawl, nɨŋɨd apan ak pen, chen ñɨluk okok nap kɨli apɨlɨg tap ñɨŋɨlaknɨŋ, dayday bog muk okok yowup okok nep ñɨbal agak.
